channel.title: IDFA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in IDFA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Amsterdam Doc Fest IDFA to Celebrate Susana deSousa Dias, Explore Institutions, Disconnection
item.description: The Portuguese guest of honor “has built an internationally acclaimed body of work that interrogates dictatorship, colonial legacies, and the fragile terrain of memory,” organizers highlighted.
